channel.title: 其它 on Kei的记录本
channel.description: Recent content in 其它 on Kei的记录本

item.title: Centos Openshift Paas 虚拟平台部署
item.description: OKD部署 Openshift版本（虚拟化管理平台）： OpenShift Container Platform(Enterprise-OCP) 企业版 Origin Community Distribution of Kubernetes(OKD) 开源版 实验的软硬件环境情况： OS: centos 7 Ver: 3.11 Master node has up to 16G memory and up to 4 vCPU. Compute node has up to 8G memory and up to 1 vCPU. /var master最小40G，node 最小15G，etcd 最小20G 主机类型 主机名 IP地址 操作系统 master,etcd master.lnfiber.xyz 192.168.122.96 centos 7 node node01.lnfiber.xyz 192.168.122.97 centos 7 node node02.lnfiber.xyz 192.168.122.98 centos 7 没有D

item.title: Centos 8 dnf 命令管理
item.description: dnf包管理命令 # 查看有效的源 [root@localhost ~]# dnf repolist Last metadata expiration check: 2:13:00 ago on Mon 02 Dec 2019 07:34:33 AM EST. repo id repo name status AppStream CentOS-8 - AppStream 5,089 BaseOS CentOS-8 - Base 2,843 # 查看所有源（包括失效关闭的） [root@localhost ~]# dnf repolist all Last metadata expiration check: 2:13:26 ago on Mon 02 Dec 2019 07:34:33 AM EST. repo id repo name status AppStream CentOS-8 - AppStream enabled: 5,089 AppStream-source CentOS-8 - AppStream Sources disabled BaseOS CentOS-8 - Base enabled: 2,843 BaseOS-source CentOS-8 - BaseOS Sources disabled PowerTools CentOS-8 - PowerTools disabled base-debuginfo CentOS-8 - Debuginfo disabled c8-media-AppStream CentOS-AppStream-8 - Media disabled c8-media-BaseOS CentOS-BaseOS-8 - Media disabled centosplus CentOS-8 - Plus disabled centosplus-source CentOS-8 - Plus Sources disabled cr CentOS-8 -

item.title: C.Zabbix

item.title: Yagmail-邮件发送包
item.description: [1] 包所在地址 https://github.com/kootenpv/yagmail [2] 包安装 pip3 install yagmail [3] 包用法 #!/bin/python3 # 邮件正文，html中嵌入sound,vedio images file contents = ['This is the body, and here is just text http://somedomain/image.png', 'You can find an audio file attached.', '/local/path/song.mp3'] # smtp starttls认证 yag = yagmail.SMTP(user="aaa@163.com",password="123",host="smtp.163.com",port=587,smtp_starttls=True, smtp_ssl=False) # smtp plain认证 yag = yagmail.SMTP(user="aaa@163.com",password="123",host="smtp.163.com",port=25,smtp_starttls=False, smtp_ssl=False) status = yag.send(to="bbb@163.com",title="邮件标题

item.title: The third's Packages for Python3
item.description: python常用第三方包 1.python之邮件发送 yagmail 2.python之MySQL mysql-connector 3.python之表格Openpyxl 4.python之字符命令argparse 5.python之Html及xml文档解析beatifulSoup 6.python之数据库ORM Peewee 7.python之日志logg
